entities.name: imperius curse
entities.description: The Imperius Curse is a spell that can be used to control someone's actions. It was placed upon Pius Thicknesse by Yaxley.

entities.name: pius thicknesse
entities.description: Pius Thicknesse is the Head of the Department of Magical Law Enforcement. He has been placed under an Imperius Curse by Yaxley.

entities.name: yaxley
entities.description: Yaxley is a person who has succeeded in placing an Imperius Curse upon Pius Thicknesse.

entities.name: dolohov
entities.description: Dolohov is Yaxley's neighbor and clapped him on the back after he placed the curse.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is a person who wants to surround Scrimgeour with their people before acting.

entities.name: scrimgeour
entities.description: Scrimgeour is the Minister whose life Voldemort wants to target.

entities.name: department of magical law enforcement
entities.description: The Department of Magical Law Enforcement is an organization headed by Pius Thicknesse.

relationships.description: Yaxley placed the Imperius Curse upon Pius Thicknesse.
Voldemort wants to surround Scrimgeour with their people before acting.
Voldemort wants to surround Scrimgeour with people like Pius Thicknesse before acting.
